title: New: Wooden Walls – Winter’s Not So Long
content:
This isn’t a ‘Christmas song’ as such, more a track built upon the gloomy confines of the season which we’re currently in.

Anyway, Winter’s Not So Long is appears to be quite folk influenced, but carves it’s very own sombre, brooding sound, allowing Wooden Walls to develop an entirely unique personality. Self-described on their bandcamp page as “built in reverb. drowned in patch cables. wooden boxes and little voices“, this particular number goes to show that not all aspects surrounding this time of year are completely shit.

Winter’s Not So Long is available for free download as part of a unique advent collection featuring drawings, short stories, exclusive music and much more, courtesy of FIKA Recordings.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
